spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Stripper
spec_data.Description:
This be Pod::Stripper, a subclass of Pod::Parser. It parses perl files,
stripping out the pod, and dumping the rest (presumably code) to wherever
you point it to (like you do with Pod::Parser).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:21:21 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Strip all pod, and output what's left
